name: Buffer Width
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Width of vegetated riparian buffer that filters nutrients/sediment and moderates temperature and organic matter inputs.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Riparian/Floodplain

Method: Desktop (GIS) and/or Field
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure average buffer width along the reach by land use/valley setting; apply slope- or stream-type-stratified SQT thresholds.

inputs.label: Buffer Width
inputs.helpMarkdown: GIS buffer analysis and/or field tape/laser measurements along both banks.

references: EPA EnviroAtlas/StreamCat riparian metrics where available
